resources.string: K. J. Somaiya College of Engineering

The PUBG fever has infected everyone and with a game as addictive and intense as this, it’d be a shame for it to not be a part of Abhiyantriki ‘18. It’s time to loot all the crates in sight and face the terrors of Pochinki as you run away from the dreaded blue circle of death.

Abhiyantriki is not all about fascinating gizmos. There’s something in the bag for everyone. Increase the fun quotient with Laser Tag only at KJSCE Abhiyantriki 2018. Come and engage in this challenging battle of lasers to get the experience of a lifetime.
Do drones remind you of surveillance and all things boring? Take part in the drone racing event organised by Drona Aviation only at Abhiyantriki 2018 and that too at no cost!
